info.author: Simeon "WrathOfMobius" Ronalds
classifiers: Operating System :: Microsoft :: Windows :: Windows Vista
Operating System :: Microsoft :: Windows :: Windows XP
info.description: PyVMF is a library meant for editing Source Engine VMF files. It is a first release, so many features are rather limited, but it can still be used to create brushes and a few entities.
info.keywords: pyvmf, source, valve, hammer, portal, vmf
info.name: PyVMF
info.summary: A Python library for editing Source Engine VMF files
info.html_description: PyVMF is a library meant for editing Source Engine VMF files. It is a first release, so many features are rather limited, but it can still be used to create brushes and a few entities.
